data.author: Ondelabs

changelog.release_notes: - Added category menu to the watch so that it's easier to navigate to other categorised news without using the config page on the phone (currently only supported in Pebble Time and Pebble Round).

- Added the ability to choose a category of news through the configuration page
- Minor image fixes
- Fixed issue where initial cell did not show text on the original pebble
- Now shows the logo of the source from where the headline came from

- Fixed display issue for original (B&W) Pebble
- Usability improvement when adding items to the reading list for the original (B&W) Pebble
- Fixed crash when exiting app

- Fixed issue where a headline wasn't being displayed if it was on a single line.
- Added the configuration page for this app. Currently used to display the personal pebble reading list.

- Fixed potential memory leak which was causing the app to hang
- Fixed color issues for original pebble watch

v1.0
- View the latest headlines from many sources.
- Save the headlines to read the full article later online.

data.description:
Have a spare minute while waiting for something? How about reading the latest news from around the world, on your watch! You can simply scroll through a list of the latest news from various sources.

Want to read the full article? We understand that the watch isn't the perfect place for that, but we have a solution -- simply select the headline and the app will store it to your personal online reading list*.

The new category menu will automatically organise the categories you view most to the top of the list.

NOTE: This is a beta release. Any feedback (negative and positive) are welcome. Over the coming weeks, both the Pebble watch app and the companion website (which is where you will find the reading list) will go through some iterations.

*The personal reading list can be found online. Once a headline is selected an alert will pop up with the exact url, which will look something like https://rss-news.appspot.com/pebble/9.

latest_release.release_notes: - Added category menu to the watch so that it's easier to navigate to other categorised news without using the config page on the phone (currently only supported in Pebble Time and Pebble Round).

data.title: rss-news
